3.Pros: Easy to move up if you work for it. Achieving management is not hard if you are personable and good with money. Raises every 6 months. Paid time off and tuition assistance for all employees.
3.Cons: Constantly understaffed and the upper management doesn't care. Money is the bottom line and you will work your butt off to meet targets. No holiday pay and open 24 hours on every holiday. Once you advance to a management position, they stopnworrying about your availability and won't bother to work around your schedule.
